title: BlogIt
description: BlogIt, a GatsbyJS (Delog) and Netlify CMS starter

home.title: Hello World!
home.description: Welcome to my blog! My name is Ian Agpawa and I like to develop web applications.  This my personal blog where I rant about the projects I'm working on and it serves to document my thought process.  It's a peek behind the logic and reasoning of the code; an attempt at imposing an artificial structure on the stream of consciousness of a software engineer.  I hope you enjoy the coherent chaos: ca va sans dire.
